anya-e0806n5:2_1: purisādhīnattāti attho, pakati visesananti tijamāha saddānaṁ visesanaṁ, kimpana pakativisesane
anya-e0806n5:2_3: kasmiṁ atthe carati khasā vidhīyanticcāha- ‘atthantarassā niddesā’iccādi. Atthantarassāti
anya-e0806n5:2_6: sakatthe vidhāneneti vuttaṁ hoti. Titikkhakiriyattāti iminā paresaṁ viya khādyantānaṁ
anya-e0806n5:3_0: Titikkhā khamā, titikkhati khamati, vīmaṁsā upaparikkhā, vīmaṁsati upaparikkhatīti
anya-e0806n5:3_1: attho. Sutte tijaiti niddesā bhūvādikassa gahaṇaṁ. Niccaṇyantassa curādikassa hi
anya-e0806n5:3_2: tādise payojane sati bahulaṁ vidhīyamānepi niccattamattano nātivattati. Athavā curādimānenābyabhicārinā
anya-e0806n5:3_3: sāhacariyā tijopi curādikova, taṁ yathā ‘gāvassa dutiyenāttho’ti. Vuttegoyevopādīyate,
anya-e0806n5:3_4: nāsso, na gadrabho. Kadāci pana assādinopi dutiyassa gahaṇaṁ siyā atthappakaraṇā dippabhāvato.
anya-e0806n5:4_0: Nanu ca vīmaṁsāyaṁ sappaccayavidhāna manupapannamitaretaranissayadosa duṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n5:4_1: tathāhi siddhe vīmaṁsāsadde sappaccayo uppajjate, sati ca tasmiṁ vīmaṁsāti rūpaṁ
anya-e0806n5:4_2: sampajjatīti itaretaranissayo, itaretara nissayāni ca kāriyānī nopakappantīti tenāha-
anya-e0806n5:6_2: Vissatthoti visaddassa attho. Atha kimitthaṁ chappaccayantasseva dvidhodāharaṇantyāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n5:8: Ninda=garahāyaṁ tato “itthiyamaṇattikayakyā ce”ti (5-49) appaccaye tato “itthiyamatvā”ti (3-26) āppaccaye rūpaṁ. Bandhatīti badhako.
anya-e0806n5:10_0: Tuṁsmātīha paccayaggahaṇamācikkhati ‘tuṁtāye’ccādinā. Tato ceti yato tuṁsmāti paccayasseva
anya-e0806n5:10_1: gahaṇaṁ yato ca visesana niddeso, tatoti attho. Paccayaggahaṇe tadādiggahaṇaṁ viññāyate…
anya-e0806n5:10_2: “paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa”nti ñāyato. Visesanattena vattumicchitattā
anya-e0806n5:10_4: kiriyatthā’iccādi. So kiriyattho ādi yassa samudāyassa so tadādi so paccayonte tassa
anya-e0806n5:10_6: Nanu ca tuṁsmāiti visesanattena vattumicchite bhavatu “vidhibbisesanantasse”ti tadantaggahaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n5:10_7: paccayaggahaṇe tu kathaṁ tadādino gahaṇaṁ vacanābhāvatoccāha- ‘tadavinābhāvittā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:10_8: Yato vihito tena vinā na bhavati sīleneti tadavinābhāvī tassa bhāvo tasmā. Imāya
anya-e0806n5:10_9: yuttiyā viññāyate-ttho, yamākhyāyate ‘paccayaggahaṇe yasmā so vihito tadādino gahaṇa’nti.
anya-e0806n5:10_10: Bhavatvevaṁ tadādino tadantassa ca gahaṇaṁ, tato kipphalaṁtyāha- ‘tene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:11_0: Sapāditoti pādisahitato. Kha cha suppattābhāvāti kha cha sānaṁ uppattiyā abhāvā.
anya-e0806n5:11_1: Vuttappakārasseva tuṁppaccayantassa pakatibhāvena gahaṇā sapādito kha cha sānamanuppattīti
anya-e0806n5:11_3: tuṁssaca lopo, nemittike ekāre nivatte ‘jisa jisa iti dvitte anādibyañjanalopo “jiharānaṁ
anya-e0806n5:11_4: gī”ti (5-102) gī. Jigīsappakatito “bhūte īūṁ”iccādinā (6-4) ī. Tasmiṁ aña. “Ā ī ū
anya-e0806n5:11_5: mhā ssā ssamhānaṁ vā”ti (6-33) īssa rasse byajigīsi. Yadi tu sapādito sassa uppatti
anya-e0806n5:11_6: siyā, tadā byajigīsīti ettha dvibbacanaṁ karīyamānaṁ sappaccayantassa paṭhamassekassarassa
anya-e0806n5:11_7: dvibbacanaṁ bhavatīti “kha cha sāna”miccādinā (5-69) vijiya iti samudāye ādibhūtassa
anya-e0806n5:11_8: visaddassa siyā īmhi ca vihite sapādino pakatibhāvoti visadda pubbe añāgamo siyā,
anya-e0806n5:12_0: Tuṁsmā icchāyanti ca pakatippaccayatthānamupadiṭṭhattā tena sabhāva liṅgena kha cha
anya-e0806n5:12_1: sappaccayā tadanto ca anumito na pana tuṁ, tumiha sutoti āha- ‘na tadanto, nāpi cha
anya-e0806n5:12_2: chasā’ti. Jighacchāiccatra dvitte pubbassa ghassa “catuttha dutiyānaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti
anya-e0806n5:12_3: (5-78) go. Tassa “kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā”ti (5-79) jo. Pāṇinināpīha sappaccaya vidhāyake
anya-e0806n5:12_4: sutte vākyampi yathā siyāti vāvacanaṁ kataṁ, tadayuttanti nirākattumāha- ‘vākyampi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:12_5: Pakatyādityatra ādi saddena atthaviseso gahetabbo, pakati viseso tumanto, icchattho-tthaviseso.
anya-e0806n5:12_6: Idaṁ lakkhaṇanti “tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ te”iti idaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ. Niyogatoti niyamena.
anya-e0806n5:13_1: tenāsiddhena vākyenāsiddhānaṁ kha cha sānaṁ sādhanaṁ asiddhenāsiddhasādhanaṁ. Icchāvacanicchāti
anya-e0806n5:13_2: icchāya vattumicchā. Icchāyapavattito upaladdhīti icchāya upaladdhi upālambo parijānanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:13_3: pavattitoti attho. Cetanāvaticāti vuttaṁ tasmā cetanāvati pavattito upaladdhiṁ dassetvā
anya-e0806n5:13_4: tadapadese nācetanepi dassetuṁ ‘yopesā’tiādimāha. Devadatte rajju khīlādipāṇinā uyyogo,
anya-e0806n5:13_5: kūle mattikāvikīraṇādi. Rajju guṇo. Khīlo kīla (pañcikā) saṁkvādi.
anya-e0806n5:14_0: Pulo tiṇādīnaṁ saṅghāto. Sā sunakho mimarisatīti mara=pāṇacāge’icchāyaṁ tumantā so.
anya-e0806n5:14_1: “Ñi byañjanasse”ti (5-170) ñi. Dvitte pubbato-ññassa lopo “kha cha sesvī”ti (5-76)
anya-e0806n5:14_2: dvitte pubbassāssa imimarisati. Tathā pipatisatīti ‘patapatha=gamena’ iccassa. Sā
anya-e0806n5:14_3: mimarisatīti satipi sacetanatte visattajīvitassa sunakhassa maraṇicchā sambhavatīti
anya-e0806n5:16_0: Karīyati sambandhīyatīti kammaṁ. Tañca nāma jāti guṇakiriyādabba sambandhato pañcadhā
anya-e0806n5:16_1: bhavati. Tattha nāmakammaṁ’ ḍittho ḍavitthoti nāmena piṇḍassa sambandhā. Jātikammaṁ
anya-e0806n5:16_2: goassoti gottādijātiyā piṇḍassa sambandhā. Guṇakammaṁ sukkonīloti sukkādinā guṇena
anya-e0806n5:16_3: dabbassa sambandhā. Kiriyākammaṁ pācako pāyakoti pācakādikiriyāya dabbassa sambandhā.
anya-e0806n5:16_4: Dabbakammaṁ daṇḍīvisāṇīti daṇḍādinā dabbena piṇḍassa sambandhā. Evaṁ kammassa pañcappakārasambhavepicchāyamatthe
anya-e0806n5:16_5: īyassa vidhānato icchāsambandhiyeva kammaṁ gayhatīti kiriyākammamevātra gayhate amukamevatthamupadassento
anya-e0806n5:16_6: āha- ‘yadipi’ccādi. Ayañca nipāta samudāyo visesābhidhānanimittāsyupagame vattate.
anya-e0806n5:17_2: ettha tva(tta)ggahaṇamantarenātta sambandhinyeva puttādo kathaṁ viññāyate visesavacanābhāve
anya-e0806n5:18_0: Appattiyāti karaṇe hetumhi vā tatiyā. Etthāti attano puttamicchatītetthāpi. Na iṭṭhoti
anya-e0806n5:18_1: īyappaccayo nābhimato. Nevettha bhavitabbanti vadato-dhippāyāmāha ‘sāpekkhatta yeveti
anya-e0806n5:18_2: bhāvo’ti. Yadi attano puttamicchatīti vattumicchāyaṁ sāpekkhettepi siyā, tadāyamaniṭṭhappasaṅgoti
anya-e0806n5:19_0: Aniṭṭhappasaṅgassa sarūpamāha- ‘attano puttīyatīti siyā’ti. Uppajjamānena īyeneva
anya-e0806n5:19_1: attatthassābhihitattā attasaddassāppayogoti cetampi na saṅgatanti paṭipādayamāha
anya-e0806n5:19_2: ‘na ca sakkā’tiādi. Kasmādevaṁ vattuṁ na sakkāti āha- ‘pakati’ccādi. Apūpādikāya
anya-e0806n5:19_3: pakatiyā samānatthasseva visesanassa vuttipade antobhāva dassanāti attho. Kvapanevaṁ
anya-e0806n5:19_4: diṭṭhantyāha- ‘taṁyathe’ccādi. “Tamassa sippaṁ sīlaṁ paṇyaṁ paharaṇaṁ payojanaṁ”ti
anya-e0806n5:19_5: (4-27) ṇike āpūpiko. Natu bhinnatthassāti byatirekaṁ dassetvā taṁ diṭṭhantena sādhetumāha-
anya-e0806n5:19_7: sāmyantarabyavacchedāya devadattasaddasso pādānato gurukulanti vuttipadena devadattatthassānto
anya-e0806n5:19_8: bhāvoti attho. Tametthopi samānantūpadassento āha- ‘tathehāpi’ccādi. Athāttano puttamicchatītyetasmiṁ
anya-e0806n5:19_9: vākye padassānvākhyānato attasaddassāpphayogo kinna siyāti dassetumāha- ‘nacāpi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:20_0: Padassāti puttīyādino padassa. Nacāpi appayogoti sambandho. Kāraṇamāha- ‘īyantassā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:20_1: Īyanto puttīyādi, niyogato na pappotīti sambandho. Tabbācīsaddappayoganti aññavācīsaddayogaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:20_3: atthato pakaraṇāditopi puttassatta niyatā gamyate, sutasaddassa tu gahaṇamupalakkhaṇatthanti vadati.
anya-e0806n5:21_0: Nanu ca sutte kammāti vuttattā kammasamudāyatopīyo siyā tyāsaṅkiyeva (mabhā)vaṁ sādhayamāha-
anya-e0806n5:21_1: ‘kammā’tiādi. Vattuṁ iṭṭhā ekasakhyā yassa kammasāmaññassa taṁ tathāvuttaṁ. Vattumiṭṭheka
anya-e0806n5:21_2: saṅkhyassa gahaṇamāha- ‘kammasamudāyato’ti. Kimpanāvayavato na siyā’ mahantamputtamicchatī’ccatra
anya-e0806n5:21_3: puttamiccatoccāsaṅkiyāha ‘avayavatopi sāpekkhattāyevā’ti. Na bhatīti sambandho. Evañcarahi
anya-e0806n5:21_4: idampi na sijjhatīti codento āha ‘carahi’ccādi. Mahā cāyaṁ puttoceti mahāputtamicchatīti
anya-e0806n5:23_1: Pasiddho gavādi, tassa sādhamyā samāna rūpatāya yampasiddhassa gavayādino sādhiyassa
anya-e0806n5:23_2: sādhanaṁ tamupamānantyattho. Samāno dhammo-sseti sadhammo, gavādiyeva. Tassa bhāvo
anya-e0806n5:23_3: sādhamyaṁ. Sādhyate upamīyate-neneti sādhanamupamānaṁ gavādi. Sādhute upamīyateti
anya-e0806n5:24_1: putte viya māṇavake madhurannapānadānādikamācaraṇaṁ karoticcevamatthasambhavena dvinnampi
anya-e0806n5:24_3: putte ācaraṇampi pasiddhanti āha- ‘tampasiddha’nti. Tadācaraṇena tena ācaraṇena puttamāṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṁ
anya-e0806n5:24_4: vā puttamāṇavaka saddenupacārato gahetvā visayīvasena visayabhāvavohārotipi yujjati.
anya-e0806n5:24_5: Vākyattho panetasmiṁ pakkhe ‘puttamiva puttavisaya māṇavakamiva ācarati māṇavakavisayamācaraṇaṁ
anya-e0806n5:24_6: karotī’ti, vuttiyantu yathāvuttamatthadvayaṁ yathāyogaṁ yojetvā veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:25_0: Nanu ca yajjatropamānopameyyabhāvo vuttiyaṁ īyeneva jotitoti ivasaddo nivattate,
anya-e0806n5:25_1: tadopamānopameyyabhāvo putta saddeva vattate, taṁ kathamupameyyavacanassa māṇavakasaddassa
anya-e0806n5:26_1: etthāyamadhippāyo ‘upamāna visiṭṭhācaraṇe upamānavacanato īyassa vidhāne nopameyyavacanamantarenopamānavacanassa
anya-e0806n5:26_3: īyeneva jotitattā tadantassupameyye vutti siyātyattho. Pabbatāyatīti “kattutāyo”ti
anya-e0806n5:28_0: Yathānantarasutte upamāne upameyyassa māṇavakassa payogo upapanno, tathātrāpi ‘pāsāde
anya-e0806n5:28_1: kuṭiya’nti copameyyassapayogoti atidisanto āha- ‘heṭṭhāviye’ccādi. Upamāne upameyyassānantobhāvāti
anya-e0806n5:28_2: attho. Nanu kimatthamidamuccate yavatāyo pāsāde ivācarati so pāsādamivācaratītipi
anya-e0806n5:28_3: vattuṁ sakkāti nātthabhedo-ññatra vacanicchābhedāti pubbenevetthāpi īyo siddho, tato
anya-e0806n5:30_0: Ettha kattutoiti vacanā kammāti nivattate, āyaggahaṇā īyo. Kadā pana kattuviseso-vasīyaticcāha-‘yatthyādisaddasamānādhikaraṇatte’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:30_1: Pabbatāyati hatthiccevamādinā hatthyādi saddena samānādhikaraṇatte satīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:32_0: Koyaṁ cyatthoccāsaṅkiya “abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārācī”ti (4-119) cīssa abhūtatabbhāve
anya-e0806n5:32_1: karādiyogesati vidhānā ‘abhūtatabbhāvo karādivisiṭṭho’ti āha. Abhūta tabbhāvassa
anya-e0806n5:32_2: karādivisiṭṭhattā karotyatthanivattiyāvassaṁ pāṇiniyā viya bhuviggahaṇaṁ kattabbamaññathā
anya-e0806n5:32_4: abhūtatabbhāvocyattho teneva hetunāti attho. Bhavatyatthe-nena kāraṇena laddhe karotyatthopyaniṭṭho
anya-e0806n5:32_6: karoti dhavalīkaroticceva cīppaccaye kattabbe kammeneva karotissābhisambandhassa
anya-e0806n5:32_7: diṭṭhattāti attho. Kāraṇantaramāha- ‘iha ce’ccādi. Itisaddo hetumhi yasmā iha kattutoti
anya-e0806n5:33_0: Asatyatthassa pana bhavatyattheyevāntobhāvā na tannivatti paṭipāditā. Tappakaraṇeti
anya-e0806n5:33_3: Cyantā paccayābhāvatthaṁ- ‘acīto’ti paccayavidhānasutte paṭisedho na kato, tenāha-‘acītoti
anya-e0806n5:34: Paṭhamantācī. Ṇādivuttittā “ekatthatāya”nti (2-119) vibhattilopo. Iheceti ‘cyatthe” itīmasmiṁyeva. Na ca vuccateti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:36_0: Nanu ca asati sutte dutiyāggahaṇe dutiyantehiccāyaṁ viseso kuto labbhate yena ‘saddādīhi
anya-e0806n5:36_1: dutiyantehī’ti vivaraṇaṁ katanti saccaṁ, tathāpi paccayavidhimhi yuttepi pañcamiyā
anya-e0806n5:37_0: Sabbatthāti “tamadhīte taṁ jānāti kaṇikācā”do (4-14) sabbattha. Kiriyāvātyavadhāraṇena
anya-e0806n5:37_1: yaṁ byavacchinnaṁ, tamupadassento āha- ‘na kāle’ccādi. Yadīpi adhīteccādīsu vattamānakālena
anya-e0806n5:37_2: kattunā ekavacanena ca niddeso, tathāpi tesamappadhānattā aññasmimpi bhūtādike kāle
anya-e0806n5:37_3: kammādo sādhane bahuvacanena ca paccayo siyā eveti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n5:38_0: Nanu ca “dhātvatthenāmasmī”ti (5-12) ippaccaye patte-yamārabbhate assapi dhātvattheyeva
anya-e0806n5:38_1: vidhānaṁ, tato ca saddādīhi dhātvatthe ippaccayena na bhavitabbaṁ, dissate ca ippaccayapayogoccāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n5:38_3: nānāvākyaṁ, tassa bhāvena, tena bhinnavākyabhāvenāyassa ippaccayassa ca samuccayatoti
anya-e0806n5:38_4: attho. “Dhātvatthenāmasmī”tyekaṁ vākyaṁ, “saddādīni karotya”paraṁ. Etāni dve bhinnavākyāni-
anya-e0806n5:38_5: ‘dhātvatthe nāmasmā ippaccayo bhavati, saddādīni karoticcasmiṁ atthe āyo bhavatī’ti
anya-e0806n5:38_6: paccekamākhyātāpekkhāya vākyaparisamattiyā bhinnatā, abhinne hi kiriyāpadekavākyatā,
anya-e0806n5:38_7: bhinnetu nānāvākyatā, nānāvākye ca sati samuccayo. Na hi sāmaññavisesabhāvena vidhānameva
anya-e0806n5:38_8: bādhāhetu, kiñcarahi ekavākyatāpi, taṁ yathā-‘brāhmaṇānaṁ dadhi diyyataṁ, takkaṁ
anya-e0806n5:38_9: koṇḍaññāye’ti. Nānāvākye tu samuccayo, taṁ yathā- ‘brāhmaṇā bhojīyantu, māḍharāya
anya-e0806n5:38_10: vatthayugalaṁ dīyatū’ti māḍharo brāhmaṇabhāvena bhojīyate vatthayugalañca labhate,
anya-e0806n5:38_11: tenojukaṁ vuttena vatthayugaladānena sāmaññavuttaṁ bhojanaṁ na bādhīyate, tathehāpi
anya-e0806n5:38_12: ujukaṁ vihitenāyena sāmaññavihito ippaccayo na bādhīyate lakkhiyānurodhena satthakārassa
anya-e0806n5:38_13: vākya bhedābhedoti nānavaṭṭhitidosoti maññate. Timhi le ca siddhanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:39_0: Yappaccayo na vihito pāṇinīādīhi viyāti adhippāyo. ‘Jala dala- dittiyaṁ’. “Māno”ti
anya-e0806n5:39_3: Jalamānāti aṭṭhakathāvacanatoti iminā kiriyāsamabhihāre yappaccayābhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n5:39_4: Iminā ca sakkate viya bhusābhikkhaññepi kiriyāsamabhihāro kiriyāparivattanaṁ, tañca
anya-e0806n5:39_5: yadā kiriyamaññena kattabbamañño karoti, tena kattabbañcetaro, tadā bhavatīti viññeyyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:39_7: “māno”ti sāmaññena vihito mānappaccayo bhusatthe ābhikkhaññe ca bhavissati. Daddalla
anya-e0806n5:39_8: mānāti ettha bhusaṁ jalamānā, punappuna jalamānāti ca attho veditabbo.
anya-e0806n5:41: Namo karoti namosaddamuccāreti, saddaṁ karoti saddamuccāretīticcevamattho (na) gahetabbe anissayanato anabhidhānato vā.
anya-e0806n5:43_0: Aparinipphannoti anipphanno asiddhāvatthoti attho. Kārakasādhiyoti yathālābhaṁ kārakehi
anya-e0806n5:43_1: sādhiyo. Asatvabhūtoti adabbabhūto. Ayantu kiriyārūpo padattho pacatyādīnaṁ vikledanādipadhānakiriyārūpo
anya-e0806n5:43_2: ca tadavayavarūpā pubbaparībhūtauddhanāro panādikādayo tādatthiyā ca pacatyādivacanīyā.
anya-e0806n5:43_3: Tasmā yathā vuttalakkhaṇe dhātvatthe dhātuto vidhīyamāno tyādippaccayo tathābhūtameva
anya-e0806n5:43_5: devadattena, ṭhīyate devadattehī’ti bhavati. Na yatokutocītiādinā yato yattha na
anya-e0806n5:43_6: dissati, tato tattha na hotīti dīpeti. Yato yattha vidhi, sa tassa sambandhī bhavatīti
anya-e0806n5:43_7: nāmehi vacanīyatthato-tthantarabhūto yoyaṁ dhātvattho kamādīnamatthabhūto, so sakatthoti
anya-e0806n5:44_0: Tassacāti ekārassa ca. Atha atihatthayaticcādo pādivisiṭṭhe eva dhātvatthe ippaccayassa
anya-e0806n5:44_1: vidhānā tadatthavihiteneva ippaccayena pādivisiṭṭho dhātvattho vutto, tena kimattho
anya-e0806n5:46: Atthamācikkhati, vedamācikkhatīti viggaho. Sukhāpeticcādo sukhaṁ vedayaticcādinā viggaho. Vāpāṭhāti vikappena pāṭhato.
anya-e0806n5:48_0: Asati sutte sakattheti kathaṁ labbhatīti āha- ‘atthānati desā’ti. Atthā-natidesāti
anya-e0806n5:48_1: atthavisesassa kassaci sutte aniddesāti attho. Atthavisesassā-natidesamattena sakatthoyeva
anya-e0806n5:48_2: ṇinā vāccoti kathaṁ viññāyateccāha- ‘sakatthassa ca sutattā’ti. Cura=theyye iccādīsu
anya-e0806n5:48_3: theyyādikassa sakatthassa sutattāti attho. Yogavibhāgatoti ‘ṇī’tiyogavibhāgato, rajjaṁ
anya-e0806n5:48_4: kāretīti ettha sāmyamaccādikaṁ sattaṅgaṁ rajjaṁ pavattetīti vā attho, payojakabyāpāre ṇi.
anya-e0806n5:50_0: Payojako codako byāpārakoti attho nanu ca vuttiyaṁ ‘kattāraṁ payojayatī’ti vuttaṁ
anya-e0806n5:50_1: kathaṁ payujjamānassa kattuttaṁti āha- ‘payujjamāno’ccādi. Nāvassaṁ kiriyāpavattakatteneva
anya-e0806n5:50_2: yoggatāmattenapi kattuttaṁ siyāti dassento āha- ‘kiriyāya yoggo’tiādi. Pāsāṇambalenuṭṭhāpeti’ccādīsu
anya-e0806n5:50_3: hi yogyatāyapi kattuttāvasāyosiyā, kopanāyaṁ payojakabyapāroti āha- ‘pesane’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:50_4: Dāsādino hīnassa katthaci atthe niyojanaṁ pesanaṁ. Guruādino sakkārapubbaṁ byāpāraṇamajjhesanaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:50_5: Taṁ pesanajjhesanādikaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ sabhāvo yassa so tathā vutto.
anya-e0806n5:51_0: Ādisaddena ānukūlyabhāgino byāpārassa gahaṇaṁ, tathā ca ‘bhikkhā vāsayati kārīso-jjhāpesī’ti
anya-e0806n5:51_1: sijjhati. Bhikkhā hi pacurabyañjanavatī labbhamānā vāsānukūlaṁ tittivisesamupajanayati.
anya-e0806n5:52_0: Payojakabyāpāretīdaṁ paccayavisesanaṁ vā siyā pakativisesanaṁ vā. Tattha yadi pakativisesanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:52_1: siyā, tadā payojakabyāpāre vattamānā ṇīṇāpī vidhīyantīti (gamanaṁ) pati yo niyogo
anya-e0806n5:52_2: tadattho gami, na gatyattho, tassa cāyaṁ payojjoti ‘gamayati māṇavakaṁ gāma’nti gatyatthassa
anya-e0806n5:52_3: payojje “gatibodhāhāre”ccādinā (2-4) vihitā dutiyā na pappoti, tato pakatyatthavisesanapakkho
anya-e0806n5:52_4: duṭṭhoti paccayavisesanapakkhaṁ dassetumāha- ‘paccayavisesanaṁ vedaṁ na pakativisesana’nti.
anya-e0806n5:53_0: Payojakamattaggahaṇeti mattasaddo sāmaññavācī, yathā ‘kaññā mattaṁ vārayatī’ti. Kattāraṁ
anya-e0806n5:53_1: yo payujjati yo ca karaṇādīnaṁ payojako tesaṁ sāmaññena gahaṇe satīti attho. Byāpāretvevāti
anya-e0806n5:53_2: payojakaggahaṇamantarena byāpāreicceva vacanaṁ kattabbaṁ siyāti bhāvo, tanti payojakaggahaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:53_3: visiṭṭho visayo yassa payojakaggahaṇassataṁtathāvuttaṁ. Kopanāyaṁvisiṭṭho visayoccāha-
anya-e0806n5:53_4: ‘yo loke’iccādi. Itovāti vakkhamānassa hetuno parāmāso. Tanti curādīhi ṇividhānaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:53_5: Evaṁsaddo vakkhamānāpekkho. Taṁ visuṁ curādīhi ṇividhānameva vakkhamānappakārena
anya-e0806n5:53_6: saphalaṁ siyā nāññathāti attho. Tameva pakāraṁ dasseti‘yadiminā’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:55: Kattari vihitesupi mānantatyādīsu parabhūtesu kyo bhavatīti viññāyeyyāti ‘bhāvakammesū’ti na kyassa visesananti āha- ‘mānantatyādīna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:56_0: Yadi hi kattari vihitesu siyā, tathā sati tesamubhinnaṁ padhānattenābhidhīyamānānamaññamaññānapekkhattā
anya-e0806n5:56_1: asambandho siyā, na ce vambhūtānamabhidhānamatthi, na hi ‘ṭhīyate’ccasmā bhāvo kattā
anya-e0806n5:56_2: ca patīyate, nāpi ‘gamyate’ccasmā kammaṁ kattāca. Api tu bhāvakammāneva gamyante,
anya-e0806n5:57_0: Tesamevāti mānantatyādīnameva. Parasamaññābhi paresaṁ kaccāyanā naṁ parokkhāicceva
anya-e0806n5:57_1: nāmaṁ. Tabbajjitesūti parokkhāsaññipaccayavajjitesu. Aparokkhesūti ettha parasamaññāvasena
anya-e0806n5:57_2: parokkhāiccanena saha samāsaṁ dassetvā idāni aññathāpi paṭipādetuṁ ‘athavā’tiādimāha.
anya-e0806n5:57_3: Parokkheti indriyāvisaye kāle. Parokkhevihitā paccayāti iminā upacārena taddhitappaccayavasena
anya-e0806n5:57_4: vā parokkhāti saddanipphattimāha. Te pana‘a u’ iccādayo. Tatoti parokkhappaccayato.
anya-e0806n5:58_0: Nanu pubbapakkhe ‘aparokkhesū’ti ettha ‘parokkhāvajjitesū’ti attha vacanaṁ yujjati,
anya-e0806n5:58_2: atthavacanaṁ yujjatīti āha- ‘tepanā’tiādi. Idhāti aparokkhesūti imasmiṁ. Nanu ca
anya-e0806n5:58_4: vihitatā kathanti manasi nidhāyāha ‘parokkhe’iccādi. Bhavanaṁ bhāvo kiriyādhātvattho.
anya-e0806n5:59_0: Sādhīyamānāvatthoti iminā siddhāvatthā nirassate. Pubbaparībhūto padhānakiriyāvayavabhūto
anya-e0806n5:59_1: kiriyārūpo attho lakkhaṇaṁ sabhāvo yassa dhātvatthassa so tathā vutto. Satvabhūtoti
anya-e0806n5:59_2: ettha patīyatīti seso. Bahuvacanampi hoti pākāpāketi adhippāyo, karīyatīti kammaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:59_3: tañca yadipi nāmādikammamatthi, tathāpi kriyatthāiccādhikārato mānādīnamaññatthālabbhanato
anya-e0806n5:59_4: ca kiriyā sambandhova gayhate, su-savane sūyamānaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:60_0: Pāṇiniyehettha “bhindati kusūlaṁ’tyādo yā bhedanādikiriyā kammani dissate, sā yadā
anya-e0806n5:60_2: sayameve’ccādinā, tadāssa kattuno suttantarena kammasarikkhabhāvo vidhīyate ‘kammanissayaṁ
anya-e0806n5:60_3: kāriyaṁ yathā siyā’ti. Tannissāyāha- ‘yadā kammameve’ccādi. Yadā kammameva kattubhāvena
anya-e0806n5:60_4: vivacchīyateti sambandho. Kathaṁ katvā tathā vivacchīyateccāha- ‘attasamavetāya’iccādi.
anya-e0806n5:60_5: Attasaddena kammamatra vivacchitaṁ, attani samavetā ekadesībhūtā attasamavetā, tassā
anya-e0806n5:61_0: Subhedattādineti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā. Atthatoti ‘kammeyeva kyo’ti (na sakkhi)
anya-e0806n5:61_1: tasmā vuttanti adhippāyo. Tathāhi ‘bhijjateti savanā kammatāvagamyate’ti iminā atthato
anya-e0806n5:61_3: Aññathāti yadi kammeyeva tepaccayo na siyā. Atoti bhijjate iccasmā. Upasaṁharamāha-
anya-e0806n5:61_4: ‘tasmā’iccādi. Kiṁ vacanenāti pāṇinīyānamiva kiṁ suttattarenāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:62_0: Vacanābhāvepi kammakattari padasaṅkhārakkamopadassanamukhena vutti ganthaṁ vivaritumāha-
anya-e0806n5:62_2: vākyato visuṁ katvā bhijjate’ti pade saṅkhariyamāne nipphādīyamāneti attho. Tadevāti
anya-e0806n5:62_3: padatthasāmaññameva. Tannipphādaneti tassa saṅkharimānassa padassa saṅkharaṇe. Sayantīmassātra
anya-e0806n5:62_4: attanāti attho. Na kevala manenetadeva vuttaṁ- ‘kammeyeva paccayo’ti, kiñcarahi aññampatthīti
anya-e0806n5:62_5: dassetumāha- ‘anena ce’ccādi. Co vattabbantarasamuccaye. Anenabhijjateti savanāiccādinā
anya-e0806n5:62_6: idañcāhāti attho. Kintadiccāha ‘kamma kattuno’ccādi, na padamudāharaṇanti kammakattuno
anya-e0806n5:62_7: vākyamevodāharaṇaṁ… vākyeneva tassa patītiyā maññate. Padamevodāharaṇaṁ kasmā na
anya-e0806n5:63_0: Asmiṁ pakkheti asmiṁ kattuttena vivacchite pakkhe. Tabbisayattanti kammavācīsayaṁ
anya-e0806n5:63_1: saddavisayattaṁ. Bhāvakammesūtīmassa kattariccassa ca paccayavisesanatthe sati sāmatthiyaladdhampayojanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:63_2: dassetumāha- ‘bhāvakammesū’tiādi. Iminā anena ca visesisattāti sambandho. Kintaṁ
anya-e0806n5:63_3: visesitanti āha- ‘mānanta tyādīsū’ti. Kintampayojananti payojanaṁ dassetumāha- ‘tyādīna’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:63_4: Yadi bhāvakammesu kattari ca tena tena dhānena suttena mānādayo na siyuṁ, kathantaṁ
anya-e0806n5:63_5: visesitesu mānādīsu paresu kyādayo siyuntīminā sāmatthiyena ( ) (sati) bhāvakammesu
anya-e0806n5:64_0: Natadatthaṁ vacanamāraddhanti bhāvakammesu kattari mānantatyādividhānatthaṁ pāṇiniyehi
anya-e0806n5:64_1: viya suttantaraṁ nāraddhanti attho. Atha bhāvakammesu kattari ca mānādividhānatthaṁ
anya-e0806n5:64_2: vacanaṁ nāraddhaṁ dhātuniyamanaṁ dhātuniyamatthaṁ tvassa vattabbanti tañca sāmatthiyāva
anya-e0806n5:64_4: ca sakammakā kamme kattari ceti kiriyatthaniyamo yathāvuttena sāmatthiyā labbhateti
anya-e0806n5:64_5: sambandho. Akammakānaṁ kammavirahā, sakammakānañca satopi bhāvassāppadhānattā akammakā
anya-e0806n5:64_6: kattari bhāve ca bhavanti na kamme, sakammakā kammasabbhāvā kattari kamme ca bhavanti
anya-e0806n5:65_0: Kammamapekkhateti pacādito kattari paṭhamapurisekavacane kate pacaticcādīsu pacādino
anya-e0806n5:65_1: pacanādikiriyā odanādikaṁ kammamapekkhate. Kattuttamapekkhateti bhavaticcādīsu bhūādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n5:69_0: Jinantoti “byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasso. Sabbattheva yattha kattari paccayo
anya-e0806n5:69_1: tattha vikaraṇāpi kattariyeva, yattha bhāvakammesu tattha vikaraṇāpi bhāvakammesuyeva,…
anya-e0806n5:69_2: ekāya pakatiyā kārakabhede(na) paccayassāsambhavato. Tasmā sahābhidhānānaṁ mānādivikaraṇānaṁ
anya-e0806n5:71_1: kattabbo karaṇīyo. “Apavāda visaye ussaggo nābhinivisatī”ti eso ussaggadhammo. Tabbādīnantu
anya-e0806n5:71_2: kesañcussaggānampi apavādavisaye pavatti hoti bahulādhikārā. Yathā “bhāvakammesu
anya-e0806n5:71_3: tabbānīyā”ti ussaggo, “vadādīhiyo”ti (5-30) apavādo taṁvisayepi tabbānīyā honti ‘gantabbo
anya-e0806n5:75: Annatotīminā ‘bhoggamañña’ntettha aññaṁ nāma annavatā aññanti atthamāha.
anya-e0806n5:77: Kammakaro bharitabbatāyeccādinā kiriyāsaddattaṁ bhaccasaddassa dassento saññābhāvamapākaroti. “Saññāyaṁ bharā”ti ca gaṇasuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ, tenāha- ‘saññāyaṁ bharā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:78_0: Abharitabbāpiccādinā idaṁ dīpeti duvidhā saññāsaddā keci daccanta vigatāvayavatthā
anya-e0806n5:78_1: yathā ḍitthādayo, kecidavayavatthānugatāyathā sattapaṇṇādayo, tattha bhariyāsaddassa
anya-e0806n5:78_2: kammampavattinimittaṁ ‘bharitabbā bhariyā’ti, yathā satta paṇṇāni assāti sambandho
anya-e0806n5:78_4: kvacideva tvatthavisese satyasati vā tasmiṁ nimitte saddo vattatī”ti. Okārassāti
anya-e0806n5:80_0: Saddikānanti pāṇiniyakaccāyanādiveyyākaraṇānaṁ. Pesanaṁ sakkārapubbakaṁ vā niyojanaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:80_1: Kāmacārānuññāti kattumicchato yathiccha manujānanaṁ atisaggonāmāti attho. Nimittabhūtassāti
anya-e0806n5:81_0: Nanu ca sāmaññena vihitā e(te), tathā ca sati vijjhatthavihi tehi eyyādīhi te bādhīyanticcāha-
anya-e0806n5:81_1: ‘nace’ccādi. Vidhivisesatte pīti vidhānaṁ vidhi niyojanaṁ kiriyāsu byāpāraṇā, tassa
anya-e0806n5:81_2: vidhino pesādīnaṁ visesattepi, nāvassantiādi jayādiccabyākhyānaṁ nissāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:81_3: vuttañhi tena “kimatthaṁ pesādīsu kiccasaññino tabbaanīyaṇyatyappaccayā vidhīyante,
anya-e0806n5:81_4: na sāmaññena bhāvakammesu vihitā, evamete vihitāeva, vo-kāsikāvutti pesvādīññasvatra
anya-e0806n5:81_5: ca bhavissantīti visesavihitena vidhyādīsu paccayena bādhīyante, vāsarūpavidhinā
anya-e0806n5:81_6: bhavissanti evañcarahi etaṁ ñāpeti ‘itthīadhikārato parena vāsarūpavidhi nāvassambhavatī’ti
anya-e0806n5:81_7: kimatthamiccādi codya, vicasasavihiteccādi parihāro, kiccā hi sāmaññena vihitā, pañcamī
anya-e0806n5:81_8: tu pesādinātthavisesena, ato tena visesavihitena kiccā pesādivisaye bādhīyeranti
anya-e0806n5:81_9: punabbiyate, vāsarūpeccādinā parihāraṁ vighaṭayati. evaṁ carahiccādinā pesādīsu kiccavidhānassa
anya-e0806n5:81_11: vā vikappena bādhako hoti ussaggassāti etaṁ avassaṁ na hotīti ñāpanatthampi na vidhīyateti
anya-e0806n5:81_13: apavādappaccayo ussaggassa bādhako bhavati itthi adhikāre vihitappaccayaṁ vajjayitvāti
anya-e0806n5:82_0: Bhotā khalu kaṭo kātabboccādi pesane. Tvayā kaṭo kātabboti anuññāyaṁ. Pattakāle paramudāharaṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:82_1: Ettha pana kaṭakaraṇe kālārocanamattameva viññāyati, na pesādi. “Sattyarahesveyyādī”ti
anya-e0806n5:82_3: vuttamatthaṁ vivarati ‘sattī’tiādinā. Kathaṁ sattivisiṭṭhatā kattunoti āha- ‘taṁyogā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:82_4: Tāya sattiyā yogo taṁyogo. Avassakādhamīṇatāvisiṭṭhe tu kattari kiccānaṁ tadaññesañca
anya-e0806n5:82_5: bhāvāya visuṁ- suttitaṁ, tena, vuttaṁ ‘āvassakādhamīṇatā visiṭṭheva kattarī’ti. Sabbatthevettha
anya-e0806n5:82_6: ‘uddhaṁ muhuttato’tiādinā ekekamudāharaṇaṁ kamena dassitaṁ. Bhotā rajjaṁ kātabbanti
anya-e0806n5:82_7: arahe, bhavatā rajjaṁ kātabbanti attho. Bhavaṁ arahoti pana arahakattuttappakāsanatthaṁ
anya-e0806n5:84_0: Galecopakoti alopasamāso. Abhimato parehi. Arahādīsu vihitappaccayehīti “sattyarahesveyyādī”
anya-e0806n5:84_1: (6-11) ca “sīlābhikkhaññāvassakesu ṇī”ti (5-53) ca arahādīsu vihitappaccayehi. Upādānasīlo
anya-e0806n5:84_2: sikkhāpanasīlo. Muṇḍanaṁ dhammo sabhāvo yesaṁ te muṇḍanadhammā. Vadhuṁ katapariggahaṁ
anya-e0806n5:86_1: yo kattā so visayo yassā sā tathā vuttā. Kiriyāvisesakattuvisayattameva phuṭī kattumāha-
anya-e0806n5:86_2: ‘assā’iccādi. Assā jīvanakiriyāya nandana kiriyāya bhavanakiriyāya vā kattā taṁkiriyaṁ
anya-e0806n5:86_3: sampādento bhaveyya bhavatūti attho. Jīvatu nandatu bhavatūti āsiṁsāyaṁ payogena
anya-e0806n5:87_0: Akenevāsiṁ sanatthassa gamitattāti āsiṁsanā eva attho, tassa akappaccayeneva gamitattā
anya-e0806n5:87_1: avabodhitattā. Nāsiṁ sanatthassa payogoti āsiṁsanā attho yassa jīvatu nandatu bhavatviccādino
anya-e0806n5:91_0: Jahanti udakanti vīhīsu hāyanasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ dasseti. Jahāti bhāve padattheti
anya-e0806n5:91_1: imināpi saṁvacchare. Bhāveiccassatthamāha ‘padatthe’ti. Nipphattimattaṁ kiriyopādānanti keci.
anya-e0806n5:93_0: Nanu ca vitoti pañcamīniddiṭṭhattā ‘vito parasmā ñāiccasmā’ti vattabbaṁ kathaṁ vipubbāti
anya-e0806n5:93_1: vuttanti āha- ‘vito paro’iccādi. Vipubbo yassaso vipubbo. Visaddato dhātumhi parabhūte
anya-e0806n5:93_2: sati visaddo pubbo nāma hotīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:97_1: kriyatthasambandhā kiriyākammasseha gahaṇaṁ. Tañca nibbattivikatipattibhedena tividhaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:98_0: Lokavidūtiādidassanato kvaciggahaṇe payojanaṁ vattumāha- ‘kammato’ccādi. Nanu ca
anya-e0806n5:98_2: vuttanti āha ‘tene’ccādi. Tenāti yena kvaciggahaṇaṁ kutociyevāti dassanatthaṁ kataṁ
anya-e0806n5:98_3: tenāti attho. Tenāti vā kvaciggahaṇena. Atha ādiccaṁ passaticcādo viya kammakarādīsupi
anya-e0806n5:98_4: nivattimadassetvā ‘kvacīti kiṁ kammakaro’ti kasmā vuttanti āha- ‘yajjeva’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:99_0: Tassāti bahulavacanassa, mahādhikārattāti mahāvisayattā. Kutociyevāti kutoci dhātutoyeva.
anya-e0806n5:99_1: Atheha kasmā na hoti devadatto sayati dāttena lunāti sunakhānaṁ dadāti nagarā apeti
anya-e0806n5:99_2: thāliyaṁ pacati mātu saratī”ti, sabbamevedaṁ kiriyā (yā) bhisambandhīyatīti yadipevaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:99_3: tathāpi kammatteneva yaṁ vattu micchitaṁ na kārakantarattena nāpi sambandhabhāvena,
anya-e0806n5:99_4: tasseva kammasaddena gahaṇaṁ kammavacanasāmatthiyā, aññathā syāditocceva vadeyya
anya-e0806n5:101: Vedanti ettha atthamāha vittinti, tuṭṭhinti attho.
anya-e0806n5:103_0: Tañceti upamānassa parāmāso. Bhedena vivaraṇanti samānādīhīti avatvā bhedena vivaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:105_0: Kārakaṁ sādhakaṁ nibbattakanti anatthantaraṁ. Karoti kiriyaṁ nibbatteti nimittabhāvenāti
anya-e0806n5:105_1: kārakaṁ. Kattādīnaṁ kiriyānimittattantu sayameva ‘tattha kattā’tiādinā bhedena pakāsayissati.
anya-e0806n5:105_2: Kiriyānimittaṁ… nibbattakesu kattādīsu chasupi ruḷhattā tenettha kattāvāttappadhāno,
anya-e0806n5:105_3: karaṇādayopyappadhānā kārakabyapadeso labbhante… aññathā kārakasaddena tesaṁ gahaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n5:105_4: na siyāti. Kimidaṁ kārakantyāha- ‘sattikāraka’nti. Evaṁ carahi dabbādīnaṁ kathaṁ
anya-e0806n5:105_5: kārakattamiccāha- ‘tadadhikaraṇā’tiādi. Tassā sattiyā ādhārā nissayāti attho, puṁ
anya-e0806n5:105_6: napuṁsake adhikaraṇasaddo. Tesu dabbā dīsu tiṭṭhatīti tatraṭṭhā, satti. Tassā bhāvo
anya-e0806n5:105_7: tatraṭṭhatā, tāya. Atha dabbādīnaṁ mukhyato kārakatte sati kimāyātantyāha ‘yadi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:106_0: Tesanti kattādikārakānaṁ. Aññamaññabyāvuttarūpattāti aññamaññato byāvuttaṁ nivattaṁ
anya-e0806n5:106_1: rūpaṁ karaṇādisabhāvo yesaṁ kattādi kārakānaṁ te tathā vuttā, tesaṁ bhāvo tattaṁ
anya-e0806n5:106_2: tasmā. Karaṇa rūpanti karaṇaṁ rūpaṁ sabhāvo yassa adhikaraṇassa taṁ tathā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:106_3: Evañcasatiko dosoccāha ‘tathā ce’ccādi. Kenaci sukarattena sappadhānattavacanicchāyaṁ
anya-e0806n5:107_0: Evañcakatvāti nipātasamudāyo-yaṁ hetvattho. Tasmāti attho. Kattā nimittanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:107_1: Kattuṭṭhakiriyānimittassa kattuno udāharaṇaṁ ‘hasati naccatī’ti. Tadattheti tāya
anya-e0806n5:107_2: kammasamavāyiniyā pacanādikiriyāya atthe adhissayanādayo pavattento kiriyāya nimittanti
anya-e0806n5:108_0: Odanaṁ pacati devadattoti kammaṭṭhakiriyāya nimittabhūtassa kattuno udāharaṇaṁ. Bhājanasaṅkharaṇamadhissayanaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:108_1: Ādisaddena taṇḍulavapanaindhanāpaharaṇādayo gayhanti. Dvidhāpattiyanti rukkhādīnaṁ dvidhā pavattiyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:109_0: Byāpaneti sambandhe. Giradhātuto appaccaye- “eonama vaṇṇe”ti (137) sutte ‘avaṇṇeti
anya-e0806n5:109_1: yogavibhāgato gakāre ikārassa attaṁ hotīti dassetumāha- ‘avaṇṇeti yogavibhāgā attaṁ
anya-e0806n5:109_3: kataessa. Sakalenāti ‘eonama vaṇṇe”ti sakalena suttena. Purīti nipāto.
anya-e0806n5:110_0: Īsakkaroti bindulopo, dvittaṁ, sāmaññena vidhānatoti paresaṁ visesavidhānasabbhāvamāha.
anya-e0806n5:110_1: Gaṇikālayaṁ gaṇikānaṁ gehaṁ. Nepathyamākappo. Dattoladdhoti paccayassa kammasādhanattaṁ
anya-e0806n5:110_2: dīpetuṁvuttaṁ. Vināliṅgavacanehi pāṭipadikatthaṁ niddisituṁ na sakkāti bhāveti sabbaliṅgasaṅkhyāsambandhayoggapāṭipadikatthasāmaññe
anya-e0806n5:110_3: paccayanimittattena gahitepi sāmaññe caritatthattā liṅgavacanaṁ nappadhānanti iṭṭhiāvudhantī
anya-e0806n5:110_4: itthi napuṁsakebhāve, pākāti bahuvacanepi bhāve bhavati eva.
anya-e0806n5:112: Sapādīhi apādīhicāti pādisahitehi pādirahitehi ca dādhāhi.
anya-e0806n5:114: Sāpānadoṇiyanti sārameyānaṁ bhuñjanakaambaṇe. Ṭhitasupāna vamathuviyāti pavattasunakhacchaddanaṁ viya.
anya-e0806n5:116_0: Yathādassananti ācikkhatīti yojanā. Tena kutoci dhātutoti. Gaṇhantīti gaha=upādāneccassa.
anya-e0806n5:116_1: Salākāsaddassa salākanti. Sabhāsaiccassa antabyañjanalope sabhāpakatito “itthi yamatvā”ti
anya-e0806n5:118: Calanādīnaṁ sīlādīsu nipphādanatthaṁ visuṁ suttitaṁ parehi, idha pana bahulaṁ vacanenevāti dassetumāha- ‘calanādīsū’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:120_0: Klikayakiccatra kakārabahuttā kakārāti bahuvacanaṁ. Titikkhā iccādo titikkhanamiccādinā
anya-e0806n5:120_1: viggaho “itthiyamatvā” (3-26). Apari paṭhitoti dhātupāṭhe aparipaṭhito. Pāṇivisesoti
anya-e0806n5:120_2: sattaviseso. Iminā ca “yathākathañci nipphatti, ruḷhiyā atthanicchayo”ti dasseti.
anya-e0806n5:121_0: Āsiṁ sāyaṁ gammamānāyaṁ saññāvisaye dhātūhi tippaccayo kiccappaccayo ca yathā siyāti
anya-e0806n5:121_1: “tikiccāsiṭṭhe”ti (7-2-3) suttitaṁ kaccāyanena. Tamiha sāmaññena vidhānāva siddhanti
anya-e0806n5:121_2: nirūpayitumāha- ‘kaccāyanena pane’ccādi. Tabba anīyaṇya teyya riccappaccayānaṁ “te
anya-e0806n5:121_3: kiccā”ti (7-1-22) kiccasaññaṁ vidhāya sesānaṁ “aññekitī”ti (7-1-23) kitsaññā katā
anya-e0806n5:122_0: Tabbādippaccayo ca vihitoti sakiyavohārenāha. Sakiya satthe avuttadosaṁ suttadosaṁ
anya-e0806n5:122_1: pariharitvā vakkhamānanayena yutyabhāvā tathā vidhāne ayuttataṁ dassento ‘nacāsiṁ
anya-e0806n5:122_2: sāya’miccādimāha. Guhanaṁ, rujanaṁ, modananti viggaho. Sayanaṁ vā seyyā. Vajadhātuno
anya-e0806n5:122_3: vassa bakārena bhavitabbaṁ, so kathaṁ yakāre parabhūte asatīti āha- ‘cavaggabayañātiyogavibhāgā vassa bo’ti.
anya-e0806n5:126_0: Atha sarūpeccetāvati vutte- ‘kiriyatthassa sarūpe’ti kathaṁ viññāyaticcāha- ‘kiriyatthā’ticcādi.
anya-e0806n5:126_1: Nanu ca lo-yaṁ kattari vidhīya mānokathamettha siyātyāha- ‘akattaripi’ccādi. Abhimato
anya-e0806n5:126_2: kaccāyanassa. Paṭipādayitumāha- ‘tatthā’tiādi. Karaṇaṁ uccāraṇaṁ, assa karoti samāsavākyaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:126_3: Na hi eva dīhi kāro vihitoti akkhare heva kārassa vihitattā akkharasamudāyato na
anya-e0806n5:126_4: pappotīti bhāvo. Atha ceti matappadāne. Evādisaddavācakā evakārādayo sādhavoti atha matanti attho.
anya-e0806n5:127: Tatthāti tathā abhimate tasmiṁ. Niyamahetuno abhāvāti akkhareheva kārappaccayo vidheyyo na pana evādīhiccassa niyamassa yo hetu tassa hetuno abhāvā.
anya-e0806n5:129_1: Kiriyāvisayarucivisesānumitanti uṇhabhojanasaṅkhātā kiriyā visayo yassa so (kiriyā)
anya-e0806n5:129_2: visayo ruciviseso, tena anumitanti attho. Kimidamābhikkhaññanti āha- ‘ābhikkhañña’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:129_3: Punappunabhāvo ponopuññaṁ. Āse vā tapparatāti tamevābhikkhaññaṁ pariyāyehi phuṭīkaroti.
anya-e0806n5:130_0: Yajjevanti yadi ābhikkhaññaṁ tappato vuccate. Tassīlyamidaṁ hotīti iminā- ‘sīlābhikkhaññādi”sutte
anya-e0806n5:130_1: sīlasaddenevābhikkhaññassa gahitattaṁ dīpeti. Aññathāpi sīlato aññamevābhikkhaññanti
anya-e0806n5:131_0: Gammamāneti patīyamāne. Patīti ca atthappakaraṇasaddantarādīhi. Abhimatoti pāṇiniyehi
anya-e0806n5:131_1: abhimato. Āvassakaggahaṇāyeva siddhoti vuttaṁ kathametthāvassambhāvo patīyati ccāha- ‘tañcā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:132_0: Yogavibhāgāti ‘ṇī’ti yoga vibhāgā. Sādhuṁ karoti, brahmaṁ vadati, asaddhaṁ bhuñjati,
anya-e0806n5:132_1: paṇḍitamattānaṁ maññatīti viggaho. Sādhunti kiriyāvisesanaṁ. Assaddhabhojīti vate.
anya-e0806n5:132_2: Vatañca bhojane atthitāyaṁ saddhaassaddhabhojanavisayāyaṁ pavattiyaṁ yadi bhuñjati
anya-e0806n5:132_3: assaddhameva bhuñjati na saddhanti satthe vuttaniyamo, assaddhaṁ bhuñjati evāti nottarapadāvadhāraṇaṁ…
anya-e0806n5:132_4: evañhi viññāyamāne yadevāssaddhaṁ na bhuñjati tadeva vatalopo siyāti atthitāya (bhojanākaṅkhitattā)
anya-e0806n5:132_5: yathecchaṁ sāmaññena bhojane pavattiyaṁ mattāyaṁ asaddhabhojanaṁ satthavihitamupalabhamānassa
anya-e0806n5:132_6: saddhato nivattitvā visese hi saddhe pavattiniyamo vatamuccate, niyamocātraduvidho
anya-e0806n5:132_7: sambhavati-asaddhaṁ bhūñjati eva, athaddhamo bhuñjatīti vā, tatrādime niyame yadevā
anya-e0806n5:132_8: saddhaṁ na bhuñjati tadevavata loposiyā (ra-3-228) kātantapañjikā. Aññathāpi paṭipādayitumāha-
anya-e0806n5:134_0: Sayameva attanāeva. Kammakattarīti ubhayatthāpi kammakattari paccayo bahulādhikārāti
anya-e0806n5:134_1: adhippāyo. Ettha pana ekopi padattho kammañca hoti kattāca kārakasattibhedato. Yathā
anya-e0806n5:134_2: ‘pīyamānaṁ madhu madayatī’ti ekassāpi sattibhedā kammattaṁ kattuttaṁ, tathā trāpīti
anya-e0806n5:134_3: viññeyyaṁ. Yo paraṁ bhañjati tatthapi siyā sāmaññavidhānatoti āha- ‘nipātanassi’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:137_0: Nanucātretaretaranissayadoso pasajjate, satī hi bhūtādhikāretto vidhīyate, sati ca
anya-e0806n5:137_1: tte bhūtasaddassa nipphattīti phuṭo yevitaretaranissayadosoti. Nesadoso, saṅketāti
anya-e0806n5:137_2: byatto saddatthasambandho cirakālappavatto, nāssa kiñci asādhuttaṁ, atikkante cāssa
anya-e0806n5:137_3: vutti saddasattisabhāvato veditabbā. Ktavantā dayopi carahi saddasattisabhāvato bhūteeva
anya-e0806n5:137_4: bhavissantīti na vattabbaṁ. Bhūtasaddo-yamatikkantatthe pasiddho ktavantādayotvappasiddhā,
anya-e0806n5:137_5: ato tena pasiddhatthenāppasiddhānamanvākhyānaṁ karīyatīti. Bhūteti cāyaṁ pakativisesanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:137_6: vā siyā ‘bhūtatthe vattamānā’ti, paccayattha visesanaṁ vā’bhūte kattarī’ti, tatra
anya-e0806n5:137_7: kassidaṁ visesananti āhabhūteti pakativisesana’nti. Kutoccāha- ‘sambandhassa ce’tyādi.
anya-e0806n5:137_8: Atha paccayatthavisesane ko dosoccāha- ‘paccayatthavisesane hi’ccādi. Paccayatthassa
anya-e0806n5:137_9: kattuno anabhikkantattā ayanti payogo nopapajjateti bhāvo. Abhidheyyeti iminā payojanādiṁ byavacchindati.
anya-e0806n5:139: Kamme guṇībhūtattāti kamme sati bhāvassāppadhānattā. “Guṇamukhyesu mukhyeyeva kāriyasampaccayo”ti mukhye kammeyeva paccayo, na tu bhāve tassetthāppadhānattā.
anya-e0806n5:141_0: Nanucārambheti vuttaṁ- ‘kiriyārambhe’ti kathanti āha- ‘soce’ccādi. So ca ārambho.
anya-e0806n5:141_1: Kiriyāyeva ārambhokiriyārambho tasmiṁ. Kiriyārambheti sāmaññena vuttattā kiriyatthavisesanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:141_2: vā etaṁsiyā paccayatthavisesanaṁ vā ubhayathāpi na dosoti dassetumāha- ‘kiriyatthavisesanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:141_3: ceta’ntiādi. Paccayatthavisesanapakkhepi sāmatthiyā ārambhe kiriyatthassāpi pavattī
anya-e0806n5:141_5: Anantarasuttena yo vihito kto, sopi sāmaññena vacanato bhāvakammesu ārambhepi hotīti
anya-e0806n5:141_6: yojanā. Sāmaññena vacanatoti “kto bhāvakammesū”ti (5-56) sāmaññena vacanato. Bhāvakammesuceti
anya-e0806n5:141_7: evaṁ na vuttanti ‘yathāpattañce’ti vadatā vuttikārenevaṁ na vuttanti attho.
anya-e0806n5:142_0: Kasmā evaṁ na vuttanti āha- ‘pubbasmiṁ viyā’ti ādi. Aniyamuppatti saññāya sati ñāpananti
anya-e0806n5:142_2: Evaṁ maññate “bhāvakamma gahaṇaṁ cākārenānukaḍḍhiya ‘bhāvakammesu cā’tyanena ktevidhīya
anya-e0806n5:142_3: māne idamāsaṅkīyate ‘pubbeneva sāmaññena siddhe punabbacanā punabbacanaṁ kiriyatthāniyamena
anya-e0806n5:142_4: ttassuppattī’ti, yathāpattañceti hyuccamāne cakārena yathāpattampi kāriyamanuññāyateti
anya-e0806n5:142_5: pubbeneva vacanena bhāvakammesvārambhepi yathāpatto kto bhavatīti viññāyate”ti. Evañcarahi
anya-e0806n5:142_6: bhāvakammesvārambhepi pubbeneva siddhattā “kattariārambhe”icceva vucceyya kiṁ cakārene
anya-e0806n5:143_0: Nanucādibhūto kiriyākkhaṇo ārambho nāma, bahūhi kiriyākkhaṇehi kaṭe parisamatteyeva
anya-e0806n5:143_1: bhūto kālo ca bhavatīti kiriyāphalassāparinipphannattā vattamānova kāloti tatrakto
anya-e0806n5:143_2: na pappoticcāsaṅkiyāha- ‘kiriyāphalassi’ccādi. Kaṭekadesassāpi kaṭattā tassa ca nibbattattā
anya-e0806n5:143_3: bhūtavacanicchāti bhāvo. Nanucādisūte kiriyākkhaṇakāle kaṭo nābhinibbatto, kaṭakāraṇabhūtā
anya-e0806n5:143_4: bīraṇāva hi tadā santi, na ca tadavatthā te eva kaṭoti kathaṁ ‘pakato kaṭo’ti bhūtakālena
anya-e0806n5:143_6: visese. Pakattuṁ ārabhi, pakattuṁ ārabhīyittha, pasottuṁ ārabhi, pasottuṁ ārabhananti atthe tto.
anya-e0806n5:145_0: Anārambhatthaṁvacananti ārambhe pubbeneva siddhattā. Apādinopisilisassa sakammakattā-
anya-e0806n5:145_1: ‘yebhuyyenā’ti vuttaṁ. Sakammakatthanti vatvā sakammattamesaṁ pādiyoge sati hotīti
anya-e0806n5:147_0: Avivacchitakammo cehākammakoti kathayamāha- ‘avijjamāne’ccādi. Yātavanto yātā, yānaṁ
anya-e0806n5:147_1: yātaṁ. Ayoyitthāti yā to. Kto na vidhātabbo pāṇiniyehi viya. Kāraṇasāmaggiyaṁ bhūtāyanti
anya-e0806n5:147_2: sassādihetubhūtasamiddhiyaṁ bhūtāyaṁ. Sā ca bhūtā yevātīminā kāraṇasāmaggiyā atītakālikattamāha.
anya-e0806n5:149_0: Ādhāreceti anuvuttiyā ettha cakārato ‘yathāpattañce’ti sambandhā vuttanti seso. Evaṁ
anya-e0806n5:149_1: na kutoci apakassanaṁ siyāti evamādhārādike anuvattamāne sati kutoci ādhārādito apakassanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:149_2: visuṁ karaṇaṁ na siyāti attho. Tathā sati heṭṭhā suttenekayogameva kareyyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:150_0: Bahulassa bhāvo kammaṁvāti bahvatthādānamevātra bahulasaddassa pavattinimittaṁ bhāvo
anya-e0806n5:150_1: kammaṁceti tattha paccayo. Kecīti pāṇiniye yeva sandhāyāha. Tassāpi bhūteyeva pavattimupadisati ‘sopi’ccādi
anya-e0806n5:151_0: Nā. Bhijjamānanti paccamānaṁ. Pararūpena passinnoti yojanā. Keciti teyeva. “Matibuddhipūjatthehi
anya-e0806n5:151_1: ce”ti (3-2-188) tesaṁ sutte casaddākaḍḍhite dasseti ‘yathā’tiādinā. Akkocchi tanti
anya-e0806n5:151_2: kamme viggahamāha, tanti kammapadaṁ, evamuparipi curādiṇilope “nimittābhāve nemittikassāpyabhāvo”tyākāranivatti.
anya-e0806n5:151_3: Kasirayaṁ gatyādyane kattho, kaṭṭhaṁtyatra kimatthoti āha- ‘ettha hiṁsattho’ti.
anya-e0806n5:152: Hetunoti dukkhaphalassa hetuno agyādino. Kaṭṭhasaddassa phalahetubhūte agyādike vattamāne evaṁ hotu phalevattamāne kathanti āha- ‘yadāpanā’tiādi. Kodhātiko idha.
anya-e0806n5:154_0: Nanu ca bhāveiti bhavatināyaṁ ghaṇantena niddeso karīyatīti bhavativisayova paccayatthaniddeso
anya-e0806n5:154_1: kato bhavati, tato ca bhavatino yo bhāvo tasmiṁyeva vācce paccayo siyā, so ca bhavatito
anya-e0806n5:154_2: yevuppajjamānena paccayena sakkābhidhātuṁ tato tasmāva paccayena bhavitabbaṁ, tasmā
anya-e0806n5:154_3: kathaṁ pacituṁ pāko cāgo rāgotipacādīhibhavati ccāha- ‘bhavanaṁbhāvo kiriyādhātvattho’ti.
anya-e0806n5:155: Kiriyāsāmaññañhi sabbadhātvatthānugataṁ bhavatissattho, tena kiriyāsāmaññavācinātthaniddeso karīyamāno sabbadhātuvisaye kato bhavati tasmā pacādīhipi bhavatītyadhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:156_0: Nanu cātra tumādayo bhāve bhavantīti vutte na viññāyate kiṁvisesite bhāve tumādayo
anya-e0806n5:156_1: bhavanticcāha- ‘yato’ccādi. Tassāti dhātuno. Yo vattabbo bhāvoti yo vācco bhāvo.
anya-e0806n5:156_2: Kutoccāha- ‘sambandhā’ti. Tumādīnaṁ yā pakati tāya vācceneva bhāvena saha sambandhāti
anya-e0806n5:156_3: attho. Ṭhātabbanti bhāve tabbo. Atha kriyāyaṁtyanena tabbādyabhihitassa dabbarūpāpannassa
anya-e0806n5:156_4: bhāvassa kathaṁ gahaṇaṁtyāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi. Sakanissayakiriyābyapadesoti dabba rūpassa
anya-e0806n5:156_5: attano nissayabhūtāya kiriyāya byapadeso daṭṭhuṁ cakkhuccādo bhavanakiriyāya patīyamānattā
anya-e0806n5:157_0: Nanu ca tumādīnaṁ bhāve vihitattā kiriyāyeva padhānattanti kamma kārakaṁ nappatīyateti
anya-e0806n5:157_1: kathaṁ ‘kaṭaṁ kātuṁ gacchatī’ti siyāccā saṅkiya paṭipādetumāha- ‘yadipi’ccādi. Dhātvatthakato
anya-e0806n5:157_2: kiriyāsaṅkhātena dhātvatthena kato. Atthīti iminā yattha ‘supyate deva dattene’ccādo
anya-e0806n5:158_1: tumādayo yathāsiyunti visuṁ suttitaṁ, tenāha- ‘icchatthesmi’ccādi. Yathā ‘bhottuṁ
anya-e0806n5:158_2: pacatī’tyādo bhojanakiriyā payojanā pacanakiriyā hoti, nevamettha tappa yojanā icchā…
anya-e0806n5:159_0: Icchatthassa dhātuno payogāti iminā ‘icchanto karotī’ti ettha icchantoti icchatthassa
anya-e0806n5:159_1: dhātuno payogatthameva, na icchāya payojanaṁ karaṇanti dīpeti. Devadattaṁ bhuñjamānamicchatītettha
anya-e0806n5:159_2: bhottunti na hoti samānakattukesūti vacanato, bhojanassa devadatto kattā, icchatissa
anya-e0806n5:159_3: aññoyevātipi suttassa visuṁ payojanaṁ na vattabbanti dassento āha- ‘devadatta’miccādi.
anya-e0806n5:160_0: Icchatissāti’devadattaṁ bhuñjamānamicchatī’ti ettha icchatīti vuttaisissa. Sādhanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:160_1: ‘devadattaṁ bhuñjamāna’nti vuttakammasaṅkhātaṁ attho payojanaṁ yassa so sādhanattho-icchati.
anya-e0806n5:160_2: Tassa bhāvo tattaṁ, tasmā. Kammamevicchāya payojanabhāve ṭhitanti bhāvo. Niratthakanti
anya-e0806n5:160_3: etadatthameva samānakattukaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ tañca yathāvuttena pasaṅgābhāvā niratthakanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n5:161_0: Sakādyatthesu dhātū sūpapadesu dhātu mattā tumādayo suttantarena vihitā pāṇiniyehi,
anya-e0806n5:161_1: tenāha- ‘sakādidhātuppayoge’tiādi. Siddhāti tumādayo siddhā. Bhujikiriyatthāti bhujikiriyā
anya-e0806n5:161_2: attho yassā sattiyā sā bhujikiriyatthā patīyate. Patīya mānatte kāraṇamāha- ‘asatopi
anya-e0806n5:161_3: hi’ccādi. Parehettha akiriyatthopapadattho punārabbhoti vaṇṇitaṁ. Tadetaṁ vighaṭayitumāha-
anya-e0806n5:161_5: bhottuṁti tadasatti. Ghaṭate bhottuṁtyādo yogyatā. Ārabhate bhottuṁtyādobhujisse
anya-e0806n5:161_6: vādyavatthākiriyantaraṁ. Labhate bhottuṁti appaccakkhānaṁ. Atthi bhottuntiādīsu sambhavamattaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:161_7: Vaṭṭati bhottuṁtyādo dosā bhāvo gamyate. Sakkoticcādino upapadassa bhojanādikiriyatthatā
anya-e0806n5:161_8: na gamyate tasmā akiriyatthesupi sakādīsūpapadesu tumādayo bhavantī”ti.
anya-e0806n5:162_2: sakkotiādīnaṁ atthi yevāti attho siddhāyeva “tuṁtāye”ccādinā. Alamatthavisiṭṭhesu
anya-e0806n5:162_3: pariyattivacanesūpapadesu dhātuto tumādayo vihitā parehi, tatthāha ‘alamatthavisiṭṭhe’iccādi.
anya-e0806n5:162_4: Pahusaddampi antogadhaṁ katvā ‘samatthādī’ti vuttaṁ, bhavatissa sambhavo “pubbekakattukāna”nti
anya-e0806n5:162_6: casaddena abhimatā imassāti ‘kālo bhottuṁ’tiādino. Yathā bhottumanotiādinā paresampi
anya-e0806n5:162_7: ayameva nipphattikkamoti dīpeti. Abyabhicāratoti avinābhāvato, bhavati bhojanaṁ bhāvoti
anya-e0806n5:162_8: bhojanaṁ bhuñjanaṁ bhāvo bhavatīti attho. Natugamissakiriyātadatthāti gamanakiriyā
anya-e0806n5:162_9: bhojanatthā na hotīti attho. Atthasaddohyayaṁ payojanavacano yañca yamuddissa pavattati,
anya-e0806n5:162_10: taṁ tassa payojanaṁ bhavati. Nacāyaṁ bhojanamuddissa gamissati, kiñcarahi kāriyantaraṁ,
anya-e0806n5:162_11: kevalaṁ tena nimittena sambhāvīyate. Yadā tu bhojanatthamevārabbhate gamanakiriyā,
anya-e0806n5:163_0: Tuṁvisaye ṇakopi vihito pāṇiniyehi, tatrāha- ‘kārako vajati’ccādi. Parihāramāha-
anya-e0806n5:163_1: ‘pubbe’ccādinā. ‘Kattariltu’ccādinā yoyaṁ ṇako tīsupi kālesu sāmaññena vihito, kriyatthā
anya-e0806n5:163_2: yaṁ kriyāyaṁ upapade kattuno-bhidhānaṁ siddhaṁ, na cāssa visesavihitena tuṁpaccayena
anya-e0806n5:163_3: bādhā bhinnattā, tuṁpaccayassa hi bhāve vidhānaṁ ṇakassa tu kattarīti. Pubbaṇakeneva
anya-e0806n5:163_4: siddhepi ltvādinivattiyā so vidheyyova, no ce ltvādayopi siyunti codakappasaṅgamāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n5:163_6: eso vajati so kattā, yo eso vajati so vikkhipotyayamattho-tra gamyate, na pana tehi
anya-e0806n5:163_7: tādatthiyaṁ gamyateti attho. Codako ltvādīhi sāmyamāpādayituṁ sāmarisaṁ vuttavidhinevāppattiṁ
anya-e0806n5:163_8: ṇakassāpyāha- ‘ṇakopi’ccādi. Agatthaṁ apakatatthaṁ (potthake) yadipi ṇakena tādatthiyaṁ
anya-e0806n5:163_9: na gamyate pakaraṇato gamyateti ṇako bhavissatītyāsaṅkiya codako āha- ‘athe’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:163_10: Pubbeccādinā vutto-yaṁ ‘ṇako na vidheyyo’ccassa na parihāro… sottarattā yathāvuttena,
anya-e0806n5:163_12: tādatthiyānavagame vinicchite tādatthiyavisesena tesaṁ sambhavoti anatthakaṁ “ṇakassa
anya-e0806n5:163_15: tathāpiṇako paro vidheyyotyadhippāyenāha- ‘athāpi’ccādi. Gatattaṁ. Bhavissati kāle
anya-e0806n5:163_16: kriyatthāyaṁ kriyāyamupapade bhāve ca ṇappaccayādayo vihitā, tatrāha- ‘pākāya vajati’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:165: Sotunādīsu ‘savanaṁ kātuna’iccādinā viggaho. Suteneti savananti viggaho.
anya-e0806n5:167_0: Veti nātisambajjhate vidhino niccattā. Ekasaddassānekatthattā viseseti ‘sakhyāvacanoyamekasaddo’ti.
anya-e0806n5:167_1: Kutoccāha-‘saddāna’miccādi. Ekasaddassa saṅkhyāvacanatte yottho sampajjate, tamāha
anya-e0806n5:167_3: samudāye ekadesabhūto byāpāro niddhāriyamānoti vuttaṁ, tathāpi pubbasaddena byāpāravācako
anya-e0806n5:167_4: kriyattho vuccate upacārā, teneva ‘tesu yo pubbo tadatthato kriyatthā’ti vuttiyaṁvuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:167_5: Nanu ca satti kārakaṁ, aññā ca pubbakālakiriyāya satti, aññā uttara kālakiriyāya,
anya-e0806n5:167_6: tasmā kuto ekakattukattamiccāsaṅkiya paṭipādento āha- ‘yadipi’ccādi. Sattimato dabbassāti
anya-e0806n5:167_7: devadattādino sattimato dabbassa. Tadajjhāropāti ekattassa ajjhāropā. Eka kattukānaṁ
anya-e0806n5:167_8: byāpārānaṁ kamābhidhānāya tunādayo vidhīyamānā bhāveyevuppannā sakkonti kamamabhidhātunti
anya-e0806n5:168_0: Ekakattukānanti bahuvacanattā ‘bhutvā pitvā vajatī’tipi bhavati. Bhuttasmintettha
anya-e0806n5:168_1: anekakattukattā bhuñjitvāpi bhavati. Pāṇini yānamiva visuṁ vacanamantarena tunādividhippaṭipādayamāha-
anya-e0806n5:168_2: ‘mukhaṁ byādāya supati’ccādi. Byādāyāti dādhātussa viāpubbassa tvāppaccaye “pyo vā
anya-e0806n5:168_3: tvāssa samāse”ti (5-064) tvāssa pyādese rūpaṁ, mukhavivaraṇaṁ katvātyattho, byavadhāyakakālassāti
anya-e0806n5:168_4: byādāna supanānamantareyo kālo tassa, bhedānupalakkhaṇanti bhedassādassanaṁ. Bhedassīnaṁ
anya-e0806n5:169_0: Abhimatā pāṇiniyānaṁ, parāya nadiyā pabbato-varo visesī yateti appatvā nadimpabbato’ti
anya-e0806n5:169_1: vutte nadiyā orabhāge pabbatoti attho. Bhavati, tato ca pārebhūtanadīvisiṭṭho pabbato
anya-e0806n5:169_2: patīyate. Avarena pabbatena parā nadī visesīyateti atikkamma pabbataṁ nadīti vutte
anya-e0806n5:169_3: pāre nadiyā ore pabbatoti attho patīyate, tato ca orabhāge pabbatavisiṭṭhā nadī viññāyate.
anya-e0806n5:169_4: Bhavatino sabbattha sambhave sati ekakattukatā pubbakālatā yathā gamya te tathā dasseti
anya-e0806n5:170_0: Bhutvā bhutvā gacchatīti pare-ññathā nipphattimākaṅkhanti pāṇiniyādayo, tatrāha-
anya-e0806n5:170_2: phuṭayati ‘yehi’ccādinā. Yehīti veyyākaraṇehi. Jivaggāhaṁ agāhayiccādo pareññathā
anya-e0806n5:170_4: abhimatoti sambandho. Kiṁ ṇampaccayenāti idaṁ vuttaṁ hotīti sambandho. Aññathā siddhippakāramāha-
anya-e0806n5:170_5: ‘jīvassi’ccādi. Kiṁ visiṭṭhanti pucchitvā jīvaggāhena visiṭṭhanti dassetuṁ jīvaggāha’nti
anya-e0806n5:171_0: Ākhyātanti agāhayīti ākhyātaṁ kattabbarūpanti imānā gahaṇa kiriyāya kammattaṁ bodheti.
anya-e0806n5:171_1: Tabbisesanampīti kattabbarūpāya gahaṇa kiriyāya visesanampi. Tathābhūtamevāti kattabbarūpameva.
anya-e0806n5:171_2: Tathā ceti kiriyāvisesane dutiyāya ṇamante jāte sati. Ṇamanta rūpanti ṇamantassa
anya-e0806n5:171_3: rūpaṁ yassāti viggaho. Ṇaṁpaccayeniha kiñcineti sambandho. Iheti imasmiṁ byākaraṇe.
anya-e0806n5:171_4: Kiñci payojanaṁ. Pacāditotiādisaddena tehi avihitaṇampaccayā gahitā.
anya-e0806n5:173_0: Yo sādhayitumāraddho naca niṭṭhamupagatoti yo kaṭādisādhayituṁ nibbattayituṁ āraddho
anya-e0806n5:173_1: niṭṭhaṁ parisamattiṁ na copagato nappatto. Pavatto-nuparatovāti yo pabbatādi niccappavato-avirato
anya-e0806n5:173_2: teneva niṭṭhaṁ nopagatosovattamānoti vuccateti yojanā. Tabbi sayakiriyādvārenāti
anya-e0806n5:173_3: yathāvuttakaṭādivisaya kiriyāmukhena, idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti “yathāvuttakaṭādīnaṁ vattamānattā
anya-e0806n5:173_4: tabbisayā kiriyāpi vattamānā evāti taṁdvārena kriyatthavisesana”nti.
anya-e0806n5:174_0: Bhuñjati devadattoti ettha yajjapi bhuñjamāno hasati khajjati vadati pāniyaṁ pivati,
anya-e0806n5:174_1: tathāpi yuttā vattamānatā kattumicchitassārambho na parisamattoti vuttaṁ- ‘sādhayitumāraddho
anya-e0806n5:174_2: na ca niṭṭhamupagato’ti. Tiṭṭhanti pabbatātiādīsu niccesu pabbatādīsu bhūtānāgatānamasambhavā
anya-e0806n5:174_3: tannisedhino vattamānassāpyasambhavā yadīpi kālavibhāgo na viññāyate, tathāpi āraddhassa
anya-e0806n5:174_4: ṭhānassāparisamattiyā vattamānā evāti vuttaṁ- ‘pavatto-nuparato vā’ti. Kattuvisesane
anya-e0806n5:174_5: sati ko dosoccāha- ‘kattu visesane’ccādi. Ihāpi siyā kattuno vattamānattā, vattamānatta
anya-e0806n5:175_0: Idha pana sāmaññena vihitattā āha- ‘sāmaññenā’tiādi. Santo ‘asa-bhuvi’ntappaccayo.
anya-e0806n5:175_3: ‘dhara=dhāraṇe’. Payojakabyāpāre ṇi, dharituṁ payuñjamāno dhārayanto. Dissanto disa
anya-e0806n5:177_0: Kālakato avatthāviseso vayo. Mānovāti imināntappaccayābhāvamāha. Yujjhamānā’yudha=sampahāre’
anya-e0806n5:181_1: ādī yeyaṁ kālādīnaṁ te dhā tvādayo tesaṁ pariggahenāti attho. Kālo vattamānādi, kārakaṁ
anya-e0806n5:181_2: kattādi pakaṁsena niyamena paccayo karīyate etasmāti pakati. Kākriyaṁ āyukādi.
anya-e0806n5:182_0: Kāriyavisesanti ādesādikāriyavisesaṁ. Kāru sippijāti viseso. Tacchakādayo (tacchakakamma)
anya-e0806n5:182_1: kāratantavāyarajakanahāpitā pañca kāravo cārudāruti vattamāne kālaniyamenāññatrāpi
anya-e0806n5:184_1: nanu sutte ekassaroti pulliṅgena niddeso, ādīti ca tabbisesanaṁ, evaṁ sati napuṁsakena
anya-e0806n5:184_2: vivaraṇaṁ kathaṁ yujjatīti āha- ‘sadde’ccādi, atha jāgareccādo puthagavayavekassarassa
anya-e0806n5:184_3: jāgarasaddassa ca paccekaṁ kasmā na dvibhāvoccāha- ‘teneve’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:185_1: ‘avayavo ca so ekassaro ce’ti. Athādīhi ekassaravisesanattepyavayavekassarassa kasmā
anya-e0806n5:186_1: vattumāha- ‘ekassaroti’ccādi. Tathā sati ko dosoti āha- ‘eko ce’ccādi. Sarodīti ca
anya-e0806n5:187_0: Nanu ca pacatimhi yenevākārena pacasaddo ekassaro teneva tadavayavāpi acsaddo pasaddo
anya-e0806n5:187_1: ca ekassaro, tatovāvayavānampi paccekaṁ dvibbacanaṁ pappoti… dvibbacanakāriyino ādissa
anya-e0806n5:187_2: ekassarassa sāmaññena niddesā, evañca samudāyassa tadavayavānañcekassarānaṁ visuṁ
anya-e0806n5:187_4: samudāyassa gahaṇa’nti. Sakiṁ satthappavattiyā ekavāraṁ dvibbacanasuttassa pavattiyā
anya-e0806n5:188_0: Sāvayavassāti yathāvuttāvayavehi saha vattamānassa na vinā tehi. Evaṁ maññate “yassa
anya-e0806n5:188_1: dvibbacane karīyamāne sabbesamavayavānaṁ gahaṇaṁ bhavati, tasseva samudāyassa dvibbacanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:188_2: yuttaṁ nāvayavānaṁ, tesañhi dvibbacane ekāya dvibbacanassuppattiyā na sabbesaṁ gahaṇaṁ
anya-e0806n5:188_3: kataṁ hoti nāvayavantassa samudāyassa ca katanti puna tesaṁ dvibbacanāya satthappavattiyā
anya-e0806n5:188_4: bhavitabba”nti. Upapattantaramāha- ‘athave’ccādi. Iha ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ dvippayogo
anya-e0806n5:188_5: dvibbacananti dve pakkhā. Tatra ṭhāne dvibbacanapakkhe dosadassanato dvippayogo dvibbacanantyayameva
anya-e0806n5:188_6: pakkhobbhupagatoti dassento paṭhamantāva ṭhāne dvibbacanapakkhe bhāvinaṁ dosamāha-
anya-e0806n5:189_0: Saṅkhyeyyañcettha saddarūpamuccāraṇaṁ vā, tattha uccāraṇe saṅkhyeyye ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ
anya-e0806n5:189_1: na sambhavati… uccāraṇassa saddā(nugata) dhammattā. Saddarūpe saṅkhyeyye ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n5:189_2: tattha tañca (potthake) doso. Tathā cāha- ‘rūpadvaye vidhīyamāne’ti. Tathā sati nivuttidhamme
anya-e0806n5:189_3: ṭhānī bhavatīti ṭhānino nivuttiyā bhavitabbaṁ, nivuttiyā ca dhātuttā nivutti, tenāha-
anya-e0806n5:189_4: ‘pakatippaccayavibhāgābhāvato’ti. Tena ppaccaye pare pakatiyā vidhīyamānaṁ kāriyaṁ
anya-e0806n5:189_5: na siyā, tena vuttaṁ- ‘assa ittaṁ na siyā’ti. Pipāsati ‘pā=pāne’. Icchāyaṁ pātuntitumantā
anya-e0806n5:189_6: “tuṁsmā”ccādinā (5-61) so. ‘Pāsa pāsa’ iti dvitte pubbato-ññassa lopo, “rasso pubbassa”
anya-e0806n5:189_7: (5-74) ‘kha cha sesvassi. Dvippayoge tu dvibbacane nāyaṁ doso samāvisatīti āha- ‘āvuttiyaṁ
anya-e0806n5:189_8: ti’ccādi. Dvidhā bhūtassā tidhinā dhātusseva dvidhābhūtattaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0806n5:191_0: Yogavibhāgā ‘a ña’ādīsu gamyate. Yadi hyatrāpi chaṭṭhī abhimatā siyā tadā “kha cha
anya-e0806n5:191_1: sa parokkhānamekassarodidve”ti ekameva yogaṁ kareyya. Parokkhe vihitā añaādayo dhātutova,
anya-e0806n5:191_2: nāññatoti parokkhāvacanasannidhānā casaddena dhātuvihitappaccayāva gayhantīti āha-
anya-e0806n5:191_3: ‘aññasmimpi dhātuvihitappaccaye’ti. Yadi pana bhusattho ābhikkhaññattho vā vattumiṭṭho
anya-e0806n5:191_4: siyā, tadā bhūsatthādīsu ca daddallaticcādikaṁ hotīti veditabbaṁ. Caṅkamati momūhacittānīti
anya-e0806n5:191_5: bhusatthassa yujjamānattā tyādayo bhusatthe bhavanti bahulādhikārāti vattuṁ sakkāti.
anya-e0806n5:193_0: Paṭhamo dutiyoti ca dve ekassarā. Tattha “khachasānamekassarodi dve” (5-69) “parokkhāyaṁ
anya-e0806n5:193_1: ce”ti (5-70) paṭhamassekassa rassa dvibbacanaṁ ‘ādismā sarā”ti tu dutiyassa, tasmā
anya-e0806n5:193_4: kriyatthānanti chaṭṭhiyā dutiyenekassa renaca sambandhā paṭhamadvibbacanassavidhāya
anya-e0806n5:193_5: kamaññavākyamaññaṁ dutiyassāti na vākyabhedoti āha- ‘eke’ccādi. Assāti ‘ādismā sarā”ti
anya-e0806n5:193_6: assa yogassa, pubbayogeti pubbehi dvihi suttehi. “Ādismā sarā”ti saramadvittenupādāya
anya-e0806n5:193_7: sāmaññena saddarūpassa dvibbacanavidhānato pubbe viya byañjanayuttasseva vidhānaṁ
anya-e0806n5:195: Paṭinimittanti nimittaṁ nimittaṁ pati paṭinimittaṁ, nimitte satīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:197_1: tenāha- ‘yathā visaya’nti. Paṭhama dutiya tatiya dvibbacananti ettha puiti paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0806n5:201_0: Catthaparattāti catthasamāsā parabhūtattā. Tena paccekāti sambandhena. Samānādhikaraṇattena
anya-e0806n5:201_1: visesananti sambandho. Ācariyena yovibhattilopeneva niddiṭṭhattā āha- ‘luttayovibhattiko vā niddeso’ti.
anya-e0806n5:203_0: Dhūpāyatīti dhūpitā, paccayassāti tippaccayassa. Kānubandhakaraṇamanatthakaṁ siyāti
anya-e0806n5:203_1: ghakvikaraṇassa paccayattābhāve (taṁ) nibandhanassa kāriyassābhāvā ‘na te kānubandhanāgamesū”ti
anya-e0806n5:205_0: Pucchīyitthāti viggayha tto, tassa “pucchādito”ti (5-143) ṭho. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0806n5:205_1: E onampaṭisedhamukhenāti eonampaṭisedhassa pakatattā vuttaṁ. Cinitabbantiādīsu cīyittha
anya-e0806n5:205_2: cīyati vātiādinā viggaho. Cinituntiādīsu cinanā yāti(ādinā). Nanu ca (ñiāga)mo, na
anya-e0806n5:205_3: paccayoti kathampaccaye “lahussupantassā”ti (5-83) eo papponti kathañce sampaṭisedhoccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n5:205_4: ‘ñisse’ccādi. Nanucādimhi na yuvaṇṇābhi kathametthappasaṅgoti āha- ‘sakāpānaṁ kukkūṇeti’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:206_0: Pattokārassāti dhusadde ukārassa pattokārassa. Yuvaṇṇeccādināpattassāti (tabba) tuṁ
anya-e0806n5:206_1: paccayesu ca ṇino pattassa. Vā vidhānā na ñi. Dhunāpetabbantiādipāṭhe ñimhi akate
anya-e0806n5:206_2: “aññatrāpī”ti (5-87) paṭisedhābhāvo. Dhunāpetīti pāṭhetimhi le ca “kvaci vikaraṇāna”nti
anya-e0806n5:206_3: (5-161) vikaraṇalope ca ekāro. Asati nāgame “yuvaṇṇe”ccādinā ettaṁ siyā tampināgame
anya-e0806n5:208: Sama dama-upasame. Sametīti samako, dametīti damako, jana-janane, janetīti janako badha=bandhane, badhatīti badhako.
anya-e0806n5:210: Nipajjati nipajjanaṁ. Pamajjate pamajjitabbaṁ. Pamajjanāya pamajjituṁ. Pamajjati pamajjanaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:214_1: (1-17) antasseva lopo siyāti codanaṁ manasi nidhāya taggahaṇe payojanaṁ dassento
anya-e0806n5:214_6: Idāni chaṭṭhīniddiṭṭhānaṁ visesena vattumicchittaṁ antasseva lopapattidosaṁ dassetumāha- ‘tadante’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:216_0: Atha dvitteti kathamavasīyate sadde abhāvetiāha- ‘para’iccādi. Anantarasutte “paripaccasamo
anya-e0806n5:216_1: hī”ti vuttattā tato parassāti kinnāvasīyatīti codana mubbhāviya tadayuttataṁ dassetumāha- ‘nanuce’ccādi.
anya-e0806n5:222: “Vaṇṇe yantaṁ tadādo”ti paribhāsāya ayamattho “vaṇṇe pare yaṁ kāriyaṁ taṁ tadādo tasmiṁ vaṇṇe ādibhūte hotī”ti teti takāre pare.
anya-e0806n5:224: Tetvevāti vatvā paccudāharaṇaṁ dasseti ‘vuyhatī’ti. Vuttivacanaṁ mulliṅgiya atthaṁ vadati ‘ussā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:232_0: Vatta=vattanetīmasmā ttippaccaye vā ukāro na vihitoti āsayena ‘katha’miccādi vuttanti
anya-e0806n5:232_3: nipātanā pakkhe ukāro na hoti, tenāha- ‘vattī’tiādi. Vattanaṁ vutti vatti.
anya-e0806n5:236: Byattiniddesenāti iminā jātiniddesassānissitattaṁ dasseti. Īsseccādinā vuttiganthassādhippāyaṁ vivarati.
anya-e0806n5:244: Nāññatracayādīsūti nicchayato-ññesu aññasmiṁ cayādīsvatthesu cho na bhavatīti attho.
anya-e0806n5:246: Īmhi jasadde akārassa lopo, le tu jīrāpayati. Tassātikyassa.
anya-e0806n5:248: Diṭṭhi dassanaṁ, dassanāya daṭṭhuṁ. “Saramhā dve”ti (1-34) dvitte duddaso. “Ā ī”ccādinā (6-33) īssa rasso (addakkhi). Dakkhissati “bhavissati ssati”ccādinā, (6-2) ssati.
anya-e0806n5:252_0: Dassātyananuvattamānepi dasseva pappoti vacanabalenāti dassetuṁ pakkhantaramāha-
anya-e0806n5:252_1: ‘ādissā’tiādi. Anaghaṇsu paresu āparīhi dassāniyamena ḷoccāsaṅkiya nevaṁ, yathākkamameva
anya-e0806n5:252_2: nissitoti dassetumāha- ‘anaghaṇsu’ccādi. Āparassāti ākārato parassa dassa.
anya-e0806n5:254_0: Vuttiyaṁ etasmiṁ visayeti ettha etasminti tyādintavajjitapaccaya visayeti attho.
anya-e0806n5:254_1: Viññāyamānattā ñāpito hotīti gamyate. Na ñāpakatoti iminā idaṁ dasseti “kiñci vacanānusārato
anya-e0806n5:254_2: viññāyamānatāmattena ñāpīyate kiñci ñāpakena, asmimpakkhe vuttānusārato katthaci
anya-e0806n5:254_3: kassaci dhātuno appayogo viññāpīyatī”ti. Pakkhantaramāha- ‘ñāpakattāyeva vā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:254_4: Samattheti tathāhiccādinā. Asassāppayogoti asadhātussa kismiñci tabbādike paccaye
anya-e0806n5:255_0: Vināpi suttanti “atyādī”tiādikaṁ suttaṁ vināpi. Evaṁ maññate “asassa bhūādesena sādhīyamānaṁ
anya-e0806n5:255_1: sabbamiṭṭhaṁ bahulādhikārato bhūdhātunāva sijjhati vināpi bhūādesasuttantaranti katthaci
anya-e0806n5:255_2: kassaci appayogassa ñāpakattampissa yujjati aññattha karīyamānamihāpi atthavantaṁ siyā”ti.
anya-e0806n5:256_0: Yeti dhātuppayogā yasminti visaye, pātissāti ‘pā-rakkhaṇe’tīmassa, nappayogo pāyayati
anya-e0806n5:256_1: pāyayitabbantiādippayogo na hotīti. Evamuparipi yathāyogaṁ ñeyyaṁ. Brūssāti ‘brū=vacane’iccassa.
anya-e0806n5:256_2: Adissāti ‘ada-bhakkhaṇe’iccassa. Īādīti bhūte īādi. Etissa ca īādīsūti sambandho.
anya-e0806n5:257_0: Avabodhe etissa ṇisesu ca īādīsu ca, ajjhene etissa parokkhāsu ca ṇisesu ca īādīsucāti
anya-e0806n5:257_1: yojetabbaṁ. Sabbattha nappayogoti yojetvā attho veditabbo. Bahulaṁvidhānato ñātabbāti
anya-e0806n5:257_2: yojanā. Yakvikaraṇena niddesā ‘asa-kkhepanetī massā’ti vuttaṁ, tadāha- ‘asassā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n5:261: Pubbasaralope rūpassa samānattā antinā antu ca gahitoti ‘santi santū’ti udāharaṇadvayaṁ dassitaṁ.
anya-e0806n5:263_0: Te ca pādayo jotentīti sambandho. Anvayabyatirekehi kiriyā yadipi dhātunāva vuccatīti
anya-e0806n5:263_1: sambandho. Kiṁ visiṭṭhā kiriye ccāha- ‘sāmaññabhūtā visiṭṭhā vā’ti. So visesoti yena
anya-e0806n5:263_2: visesena visiṭṭhā kiriyā dhātunāva vuccati so viseso. Vācaka bhedatoti sāmaññāya
anya-e0806n5:263_3: ca kiriyāya visiṭṭhāya ca vācakānaṁ dhātūnaṁ bhedato tenāpīti kaccānenāpi. Saṇṭhānaṁ saṇṭhiti.
anya-e0806n5:265: Kiṭṭhamadatīti kiṭṭhādo, kiṭṭhasaddenupacārato kasitaṭṭhāne uṭṭhita sassaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0806n5:269: Anusāsīyitthāti anusiṭṭho kamme kto “sā sassa sisvā” (5-117) sāsanāya sāsituṁ.
anya-e0806n5:271: Atha bahassāti ḍhādesasambandhe chaṭṭhī kasmā na viññāyateti āha- ‘bahassā’tiādi. Ḍhayogapajjenāti ḍhakārena saha yogapajjena ekībhāvenāti attho.
anya-e0806n5:273: Ḷocāti vuttattāti evaṁ maññate “yadāyaṁ paccayādeso siyā tadā ete samāsene-kato niddiseyyā”ti, tenāha- ‘haḷāti vadeyyā’ti.
anya-e0806n5:277_0: Imassāti ‘pī-tappane’tīmassa, ihāti imasmiṁ ṭhāne. Pinayīti thūlo ahosīti attho sūyīti
anya-e0806n5:277_1: itisaddo ādyattho, tena adīyi aḍīyi alīyi alūyītime saṅgayhanti. Yāva ktiggahaṇāti
anya-e0806n5:281: Akirī, akirīyitthāti vā kiṇṇo, akirīti kiṇṇavā. Apurī purīyitthāti puṇṇo, apurīti puṇṇavā. Akhiyīti khīṇo khīṇavā.
anya-e0806n5:283: Atarī, ajīrīti kamena viggaho. Cīyitthāti ciṇṇo, cinīti ciṇṇavā.
anya-e0806n5:285: Asakkhīti satto sattavā. ‘Saja=saṅge’tī massāpi satto sattavāti hoti.
anya-e0806n5:295_1: adhippāyatthamāha. Tathāhi visesanaṁ kevalayakārato visuṁ karaṇaṁ attho yassāti añña
anya-e0806n5:295_2: padatthe sati kevalayakārassa nivattanaṁ viññāyate. Yakāramatte gahite ko dosoti
anya-e0806n5:295_3: āha- ‘yo vā tvāssa samāsetihī’tiādi. Patvāti ‘pata patha=gamane, pada=gamane’iccassa vā.
anya-e0806n5:299: Nāppakketi na appatte patteyevāti attho. Ñāpakālopoti “titālīsā”ti (1-1) ñāpakatoyeva ktvāppaccayassa yo vakāro tassa lopoti attho.
anya-e0806n5:301_0: Nanu nassāti vutte paccayanakārassāti kathaṁ viññāyatīti āha- ‘nassā’tiādi,ntamānatyādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n5:303: Icchīyateti icchitabbaṁ. Esanaṁ icchā. Icchīyitthāti icchitaṁ, āsanamāsitabbaṁ. Āsanāya acchituṁ. “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) rasso.
anya-e0806n5:305: Amānaparacchakkatte kuruādesena nodāhaṭaṁ. Karānoti “mānassamassā”ti (5-16) malopo. Kasmā ntapubbachakkesu kuru ādesena nodāhaṭanti āha- ‘vavatthite’ccādi.
